title: What's actually up with Morde's code? We got 2 new bugs this patch
body:
Numero uno is his W vfx's for the heal being WHITE instead of the usual greenish/purple particles he usually had.

Second one's more about clarity and actually impacts gameplay and it's his usual Ultimate icon not appearing over the dragon when he damages it, rendering you unable to know if you're getting a dragon clone or not.

But what bugs me most is that they just seem to pop out of nowhere with every new patch, it's really getting out of hand.
